name: Provide Product Feedback
title: Provide Product Feedback
task: Share feedback on your experience with the product.
goal: Help improve the product based on real user experiences.
details: Include feedback channels and examples of useful feedback.

name: Request New Feature
title: Request New Feature
task: Describe a new feature you would like to see in the product.
goal: Influence product development to better meet your needs.
context: Whenever you have a new idea or need.
details: Include feature request channels and prioritization criteria.

name: Report an Issue
title: Report an Issue
task: Report an issue or bug you encountered while using the product.
goal: Ensure timely identification and resolution of defects.
context: During or after using the product.
details: Include issue reporting channels and examples of useful reports.

name: Rate Product Satisfaction
title: Rate Product Satisfaction
task: Rate your overall satisfaction with the product and explain your rating.
goal: Provide a quantitative measure of customer satisfaction.
context: After using the product for a period of time.
details: Include rating scales and feedback examples.

name: Suggest Improvement
title: Suggest Improvement
task: Suggest an improvement to enhance your user experience.
goal: Help prioritize product improvements that will benefit users.
details: Include suggestion channels and examples of impactful suggestions.

name: Share Use Case
title: Share Use Case
task: Describe how you use the product in your daily workflow.
goal: Provide insights into real-world product usage and value.
context: During customer interviews or feedback sessions.
details: Include use case templates and examples.

name: Participate in Survey
title: Participate in Survey
task: Participate in a product survey and provide honest feedback.
goal: Help gather data on customer satisfaction and product performance.
context: When surveys are conducted by the company.
details: Include survey participation guidelines and examples of survey topics.

name: Request Support
title: Request Support
task: Request support for a specific issue you are facing.
goal: Receive timely and effective assistance for product-related issues.
context: Whenever you encounter a problem or have a question.
details: Include support request channels and response time expectations.

name: Review Product Documentation
title: Review Product Documentation
task: Review the product documentation and suggest areas for improvement.
goal: Help improve the quality and usability of product documentation.
context: After using the product and consulting the documentation.
details: Include documentation review criteria and feedback examples.

name: Join Beta Program
title: Join Beta Program
task: Express interest in joining the product's beta program.
goal: Participate in early access programs to test and provide feedback on new features.
context: Whenever a beta program is announced.
details: Include beta program benefits and participation criteria.

name: Share Success Story
title: Share Success Story
task: Share a success story of how the product helped you achieve your goals.
goal: Provide testimonials and case studies to promote the product's value.
context: Whenever you have a relevant success story.
details: Include success story templates and sharing channels.

name: Provide Feature Prioritization
title: Provide Feature Prioritization
task: Prioritize features you would like to see in future releases.
goal: Help the product team understand customer priorities and needs.
context: During product feedback and planning sessions.
details: Include prioritization criteria and examples of prioritized features.
